title: Dhruv Khanna
text: My experience has been and still remains the worst Their customer support should be called Customer Harassment Portal A call will be immediately picked up by the AI which will keep you on a loop for 10 minutes and then automatically drops the call in the 11th minute You want to chat for immediate answers Good luck with that I started writing this review after I was told to wait by an agent while they checked my details Those details are being checked for the past 15 minutes without any reply
author: Dhruv Khanna

title: Rakesh Sarma
text: #Go for another broker. This app has been giving a lot of issues. It is not working well in the commodity section. While putting buy/sell orders in options the executed orders don't appear immediately in the positions . it takes a lot of time. Very slow app. The interface was not this bad earlier. Bugs may be there too. The Worst customer service. Calls are not picked up.

title: Satinder K. Dhiman (Vicky)
text: using it for 4 years & there are many simple issues. 1. OFS buying option is missing 2. if you buy stocks in Right issue they will never average it with the previous purchase. unless you waste your time in sending them multiple emails. 3. Brokerage charges are high where nothing special is offered 4. Recently noticed that older history charts are deleted for many stocks. why the hell? 5. Many stocks About info is missing.

title: Sudhanshu Meshram
text: There is no such thing as "zero brokerage" there are so many hidden brokerage and govt taxes which the app doesn't mention at all. it shows a negligible value for ex 0.004% but it's a scam, I buyed one stock of 220 ‚Çπ normally exchange+taxes would be 1-2‚Çπ extra but after a trade when I opened my contract note (full transaction history+ taxes+ their hidden brokerage values) I had to pay ‚Çπ5+ per share that's 3%+ !!!! it's a clear loot and scam of these guys to lure beginner traders.
author: Sudhanshu Meshram

title: Washim Chowdhury
text: Why the balance in Groww is always a guesswork? No transparency. I had around 9k in Groww balance, but then now only showing 2k something. And sometimes it shows 6k, why 2k now? Where did you eat the rest? And you say every day the profit I earn Wil be added by the end of the day, where it will be added, I've never seen getting added in my bank account. There's an option to see all transactions, but I don't see any justifiable transaction for the money you ate. Profits don't get added either.
author: Washim Chowdhury

Every buying except ETF they recover fee in the name of total up front of margin. So every body compare all apps and start happy trading. Keep Pockets Well
